Weddings & Events Each Day Is A Gift. Some Days Are Just Packaged Better Than Others. Herons Glen Golf & Country Club, located in North Fort Myers, offers an exceptional venue for your memorable event. Our 6,000 sq. ft. Grand Ballroom features a 2,000 sq. ft. dance floor, a 500 sq. ft. theatrical stage with professional lighting and sound system, full-service bar, and seating for up to 350 guests. In addition, we offer various indoor and outdoor settings for your ceremony. Whether it be your dream wedding or any memorable event, Herons Glen is dedicated to making your dreams become a reality. Our professional and courteous staff is waiting to provide you with first-class service surrounded by a breathtaking setting. Start planning your memorable event today! Click the links below to view our event packages and policies for 2024: Cocktail Party Package Herons Glen Wedding Book Holidays in the Heat Meeting Packages Social Book HGRD Banquet Policies The ballroom can be made more intimate to accommodate smaller parties, or these can be held in a private dining room if preferred. The 6000 non-smoking square foot Ballroom accommodates 250+ for a sit-down dinner or buffet. Spacious 2,000 square foot dance floor with 20-foot ceilings with room dividers to accommodate smaller parties. 500 square foot theatrical stage with curtain, professional lighting, and state-of-the-art sound system. The tables are elegantly set and artfully arranged. Your service can be held in the lobby or along the shores of the lake. The Ballroom will accommodate 250 people at dining tables and 520 people seated without tables for a seminar/conference/concert. For inquiries, please contact Food & Beverage Director Janine Stepanich by email at [email protected] or by using the contact form below. Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Event Inquiry Form Your Name: * Your Phone Number: * Email * Event Date: Notes: Submit

Contact Us Herons Glen Golf & Country Club 2250 Herons Glen Boulevard North Fort Myers, Florida 33917 Herons Glen is conveniently located on US 41 just four miles North of the Shell Factory in Lee County, just South of the Charlotte County line. Cape Coral, Fort Myers Beach, Port Charlotte & Sanibel are just minutes away. Shuffleboard Nestled in the Herons Glen Sports Complex are 8 shuffleboard courts with all the equipment needed for play provided onsite. Shuffleboard is an easy to learn game and the social aspect of this sport is its biggest draw. Residents enjoy playing shuffleboard and the ability to meet new people in the community. The shuffleboard association holds round robin play four afternoons a week between November and March. Courts are lit for evening play. Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By:

Meet The Staff Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: HGRD General Manager J.B. Belknap 239.731.4569 Email: [email protected] J.B. Belknap has served as the Herons Glen Recreation District General Manager since 2019. He is an active member of the PGA of America and has over 25 years of experience in the Golf and Country Club industry. J.B. holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Marketing from Miami University in Oxford, Ohio. J.B. understands the passion for the exceptional member lifestyle that has been created at Herons Glen; he is proud to participate in the enhancement of the District facilities. J.B. is responsible for all aspects of daily operations in accordance with good golf course management practices and all relevant government regulations. His depth of knowledge of the food and beverage, maintenance and merchandising sectors of the golf course industry make him the ideal leader and advisor. J.B. spends his free time at home with his wife and daughter where family time includes raising and riding their horses. His “Open Door” policy applies both at work and at home. Click here for a Fun Fact about J.B.! Assistant General Manager Karon Bennett 239-731-4566 Email: [email protected] K aron joined the Herons Glen Team in 2020. She has spent the majority of her career in the hospitality industry performing administrative duties for county clubs and non-profit associations throughout Southwest Florida. While she enjoys marketing related tasks such as website design, menus, flyers, QR Codes, videos, and photography, Karon’s real passion lies in making handmade home decor items that she sells at local craft fairs. In Karon’s free time, she remains actively engaged in the local community by attending art classes, concerts, flea markets, and wedding shows as well as dining at the newest restaurants. Karon, her husband and their dog reside nearby in Cape Coral, Florida. She is also the proud mother of a son and a daughter-in-law who live nearby. Karon is enjoying the newest addition to the family, her first grandchild, Melody Joyce. Karon completed her degree in Graphic Design at Southwest Florida College. She truly values the opportunity to serve the membership at Herons Glen and looks forward to being a “Go To” person for many years to come. Click here for a Fun Fact about Karon! Activities & Events Coordinator/Office Manager Wendy Shea 239.731.4533 Email: [email protected] Wendy is a native Floridian from Coral Gables, Florida. Wendy graduated from Florida International University with a bachelor’s degree in Restaurant and Hotel Administration in 1984. After graduation, Wendy opened a gourmet ice cream and candy store in San Luis Obispo, California. Missing Florida, Wendy moved back to Miami in 1986 and worked as a Membership Director for the Kendall-South Miami Chamber of Commerce and the Coral Gables Chamber of Commerce for over 20 years. In 2007, Wendy moved to the North Port area with her family and has been an important part of the Herons Glen administration team since September 2008. In 2019, Wendy had a new house built in Port Charlotte right across the street from her family’s house. When not working, she enjoys spending time with her immediate family, her two dogs and cat and spending time on the water fishing and diving. Click here for a Fun Fact about Wendy! Director of Golf & Grounds Maintenance Tim Kortanek 239.731.4541 Email: [email protected] Tim Kortanek is a Midwestern guy who spent the majority of his childhood in Indianapolis, Indiana. He began playing golf as a teenager and quickly fell in love with being outdoors and playing the game. During high school he started working at the local golf course because he loved working outside, not to mention he had the benefit of free golf! Tim pursued a career in golf and obtained his bachelor of science degree in agronomy while at Purdue University in West Lafayette, IN. Tim’s first Assistant Superintendent position was at Ocean Reef Club in Key Largo, FL. He loved working there but did not like his daily commute from Homestead, FL. On a work trip to Naples, FL in early 2000’s he noticed how the golf industry was booming on the West Coast. Soon after he traded his sunrises for sunsets for a position as Assistant Superintendent at Grey Oaks Country Club in Naples. After one year at Grey Oaks he received his first Superintendent position at Shadow Wood Country Club in Estero, FL. After five years there he took another Superintendent position at Cypress Woods Golf & Country Club in Naples where he worked for four years before joining the Herons Glen team. Tim and his wife have two daughters and son. In his downtime Tim enjoys exploring different parks, beaches and rivers throughout the country. His love of the game of golf continues and he plays as many different courses as possible. When Tim is not playing golf you most certainly can find him either playing his guitar or paddle boarding somewhere nearby. Click here for a Fun Fact about Tim! Executive Chef Rodrigo Maldonado Office Phone: 239.731.4544 Email: [email protected] Executive Chef Rodrigo Maldonado was the executive chef at Twin Isles Country Club in Punta Gorda from 2019 until 2024 and has worked in hotels, restaurants, and country clubs. His diverse background has enhanced our operations. He is a solid addition to our team. Facilities Maintenance Manager Nate Baers Office Phone: 239.731.4535 Email: [email protected] Food & Beverage Director Janine Stepanich 239.731.4581 Email: [email protected] Growing up along the Jersey Shore and eventually making her way to Naples, Florida, Janine embarked on a fulfilling career in the hospitality industry. Her experience began in 1988 at Wyndemere Country Club, where she honed her skills as a server and bartender. Over the years, Janine had the privilege of working at several esteemed golf clubs, immersing herself in the operations of club restaurants and cultivating a deep understanding of the industry. Janine is passionate about curating memorable experiences for Herons Glen residents and guests, drawing from her extensive background in the industry to elevate every aspect of our offerings. Click here for a "Fun Fact" about Janine! Financial Controller Lynn E. Brew, CHAE 239.731.4547 Email: [email protected] Lynn has been with Herons Glen since June of 1999 when she began working as an accounting clerk for the developer, Coolidge Fort Myers Realty. She currently holds the position of Financial Controller with the District. Her education includes a Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting from Florida Gulf Coast University in Estero, FL and a Certified Hospitality Account Executive certification through the Hospitality, Finance and Technology Professionals (HFTP) organization. Lynn was born on Long Island in East Meadow, NY and has lived in New Hampshire, Gainesville, Miami and currently resides in Port Charlotte. She is the mother of three children and several dogs and cats. CLICK HERE FOR A FUN FACT ABOUT LYNN! Golf Course Superintendent Matthew Bourne Email: [email protected] Head Golf Professional Bruce J. Harris, PGA 239.731.45 57 Email: [email protected] CLICK HERE FOR A FUN FACT ABOUT BRUCE! Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By:

Board Meetings - Agenda, Schedule, Minutes & Resolutions Upcoming Public Hearing - Annual Budget Friday, September 05 at 6:00 p.m. in the Ballroom Zoom will be used for recording purposes ONLY Zoom Details: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/9687107160 Meeting ID: 968 710 7160 | Passcode: HgrdMeet1 Printable Version of the Agenda Next Regular Board Meeting: Monday, September 8, 2025, at 9:00 a.m. in Card Room C Zoom Details: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/9687107160 Meeting ID: 968 710 7160   |   Passcode: HgrdMeet1 Printable Version of the Agenda (Available 3 days in advance of the meeting) HGRD Board of Supervisors Email: [email protected] Click here to view the HGRD Board's Schedule for 2025 This meeting is to discuss the District’s business. All Board Meetings are open to the public and the public is invited to attend. Any person requiring special accommodations at any of the meetings because of a disability or physical impairment should contact Herons Glen Recreation District at (239) 731-4501 at least five (5) calendar days before the meeting. If a person decides to appeal any decision made by the Herons Glen Recreation District concerning any matter considered at such meeting or hearing, (s)he will need a record of the proceedings, and that, for such purpose, (s)he may need to ensure that a verbatim record of the proceedings is made, which includes the testimony and evidence upon which the appeal is to be based. Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Minutes for Regular Board Meetings Minutes are taken at each Board Meeting to accurately record all actions and discussions. These minutes are then reviewed and approved by the Board at the following meeting. Once approved, the minutes are made available for public viewing in accordance with Florida’s Government in the Sunshine Law. Click the highlighted link to view: January 6, 2025 January 20, 2025 February 17, 2025 March 3, 2025 March 26, 2025 April 1, 2025 April 28, 2025 May 19, 2025 June 23, 2025 2024 Regular Board Meeting Minutes 2023 Regular Board Meeting Minutes 2022 Regular Board Meeting Minutes 2021 Regular Board Meeting Minutes 2020 Regular Board Meeting Agendas 2020 Regular Board Meeting Minutes Minutes for Board Workshops As of March 2021 the Board of Supervisors stopped holding a separate workshop followed by a Board meeting each month. All matters are now addressed during "Regular Board Meetings". Minutes for those meetings are listed in the tab above called “Minutes for Regular Board Meetings”. Click the highlighted link to view: February 22, 2021 2020 Board Workshop Agendas 2020 Board Workshop Minutes Minutes for Special Board Meetings Click highlighted link to view: March 23, 2023 - PDF | RTF 2022 Special Board Meeting Minutes 2021 Special Board Meeting Minutes 2020 Special Board Meeting Agendas 2020 Special Board Meeting Minutes Minutes for Budget Meetings The HGRD Board of Supervisors had three successful days of Budget Workshops held July 14-16, 2025. Minutes for those meetings will be shared once they are approved at the next Board meeting to be held on August 4, 2025. Click highlighted link to view: J une 21-23, 2021 June 20-22, 2022 June 12-15, 2023 June 10-12, 2024 July 14-17, 2025 2020 Budget Meeting Agendas 2020 Budget Meeting Minutes Resolutions 2025 2025-01 Election 2025-02 Clubhouse Windows 2025-03 Amend F and A Committee Charter 2025-04 Amend Rules and Regulations re Storage 2025-05 Pickleball Courts Improvements 2025-06 Bond Improvements 2025-07 Bond Improvements Project Engineer 2025-08 Bond Improvements Paving 2025-09 Declaration of Election and Board Organization 2025-10  Board Organization 2025-11 - Did not use 2025-12  Bond. Weddings & Events Each Day Is A Gift. Some Days Are Just Packaged Better Than Others. Herons Glen Golf & Country Club, located in North Fort Myers, offers an exceptional venue for your memorable event. Our 6,000 sq. ft. Grand Ballroom features a 2,000 sq. ft. dance floor, a 500 sq. ft. theatrical stage with professional lighting and sound system, full-service bar, and seating for up to 350 guests. In addition, we offer various indoor and outdoor settings for your ceremony. Whether it be your dream wedding or any memorable event, Herons Glen is dedicated to making your dreams become a reality. Our professional and courteous staff is waiting to provide you with first-class service surrounded by a breathtaking setting. Start planning your memorable event today! Click the links below to view our event packages and policies for 2024: Cocktail Party Package Herons Glen Wedding Book Holidays in the Heat Meeting Packages Social Book HGRD Banquet Policies The ballroom can be made more intimate to accommodate smaller parties, or these can be held in a private dining room if preferred. The 6000 non-smoking square foot Ballroom accommodates 250+ for a sit-down dinner or buffet. Spacious 2,000 square foot dance floor with 20-foot ceilings with room dividers to accommodate smaller parties. 500 square foot theatrical stage with curtain, professional lighting, and state-of-the-art sound system. The tables are elegantly set and artfully arranged. Your service can be held in the lobby or along the shores of the lake. The Ballroom will accommodate 250 people at dining tables and 520 people seated without tables for a seminar/conference/concert. For inquiries, please contact Food & Beverage Director Janine Stepanich by email at [email protected] or by using the contact form below.
